reviewText: I found Will Hollady's video most useful even though I've rowed the canyon seven times and about to embark on my eighth trip. It showed me routes I hadn't considered before and reminded me what to do on ones I have. The special rowing techniques needed in big water of the Grand Canyon were well illustrated and explained. I think this video is a must-see for anyone rowing or paddling down the Canyon, novice or experienced.
Good video for anyone considering rafting the GC, covers the main rapids and basic whitewater 101 as well. Good whitewater safety covered also.
